snippet.title: ZX Spectrum Time-gate Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This was published by Quicksilva in 1983 and may not look it now but was seriously impressive back then with it's 3D perspective and sfx. It was possibly the first game I ever finished on a Speccy which might be something to do with the inbuilt instructions since I only owned one game legally at the time and didn't have a clue what I was doing in most of the others. The trick is to keep the aliens down near the bottom of the screen so you don't leave them any screen space to shoot back at you.

In the interests of keeping this video fairly short I'm cheating here as I know where all the time gates are. The game is also running at 2x speed
